input: Under the Citizenship Act, 1955, by which of the following ways can a person become a citizen of India? P. By birth Q. By descent R. By registration S. By nationalisation T. By incorporation of territory Select the correct answer using the codes given below:

options.A: P, Q, R, S and T

explanation: Under the citizenship Act 1955, a person can- not be a citizen of India by Nationalisation.
